name: Scary Survival Escape Game
description:
Play the scary horror survival game and escape from their before the evil catches you in the scary escape games. You have to complete all the chapter and perform the given tasks in the game so that you can survive in this game. The Game contains High quality Graphics and intense gameplay with sounds.You have to struggle and solve the puzzles before the evil comes to you. Lock the evil in cage.
Features:
-High Quality Graphics.
-Intense Horror Sounds.
-Will Add chapter 2 in next update.
